backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping privacy‑policy related features to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing functionality of multiple frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point defining metadata, SEO tags, and loading the React app with AdSense script.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing full crawling and pointing to sitemap.xml.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap listing site routes including /privacy-policy for search engine discovery.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Thin wrapper component that renders the Router.
frontend/src/components/monetization/AdP: UI placeholder component rendering styled empty ad blocks for different page locations.
frontend/src/components/nav/StickyNavbar: Sticky navigation bar with scroll‑aware styling, logo handling, and section‑scroll navigation.
frontend/src/components/roadmap/careerPa: Exports a large list of categorized career paths used for selection in the roadmap builder.
frontend/src/components/roadmap/CareerPa: Career path dropdown with searchable, grouped options using Command and Popover components.
frontend/src/components/roadmap/RoadmapB: Form component that collects career, year, skills, and study hours to generate a roadmap using getRoadmapTemplate and triggers onGenerate.
frontend/src/components/roadmap/roadmapT: Defines roadmap data structures and provides templates per career category to generate a RoadmapData object.
frontend/src/components/roadmap/RoadmapT: Displays the generated roadmap with sections for skills, tools, projects, internship strategy, and monthly plans.
frontend/src/components/sections/Academi: Renders academic tool cards and opens calculators in a dialog using lazy-loaded components.
frontend/src/components/sections/CareerR: Wraps the roadmap builder and timeline, storing and displaying generated roadmap data.
frontend/src/components/sections/DailyUt: Renders a grid of daily utility tools and opens the selected tool inside a dialog. Includes age, EMI, BMI, and unit conversion calculators.
frontend/src/components/sections/FooterS: Displays the site footer with about info, contact links, privacy policy, and a dynamic year plus an ad section.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Provides the homepage hero section with a headline, CTAs that scroll to sections, and a large illustration.
frontend/src/components/sections/ResumeP: Shows resume and placement tools in a grid and loads each tool in a dialog on click. Includes resume bullets, email templates, interview prep, and LinkedIn checklist.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Offers a theme context managing light, dark, and system themes, storing preferences and reacting to system theme changes.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Button that toggles between light and dark themes using the theme context.
frontend/src/components/tools/academic/A: Calculates attendance percentage and possible bunkable classes based on total and attended classes, showing alerts for validity and results.
frontend/src/components/tools/academic/C: Allows users to enter subjects with credits and grades to compute CGPA and percentage, with dynamic subject management.
frontend/src/components/tools/academic/M: Simple tool that takes internal and exam marks and displays their sum as a predicted final score.
frontend/src/components/tools/academic/P: Calculates percentage from obtained and total marks with basic validation and error alerts.
frontend/src/components/tools/resume/Int: Generates a customizable internship application email based on user inputs and allows copying it.
Interactive interview preparation checklist with progress tracking and copy-to-clipboard export.
frontend/src/components/tools/resume/Lin: Checklist for optimizing a LinkedIn profile with progress tracking and copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/tools/resume/Res: Creates resume bullet points from action, result, and optional impact inputs, with copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/tools/utilities/: Computes age in years, months, and days from a selected birthdate and displays the breakdown.
Calculates BMI from height and weight and shows category and value with simple validation.
A React EMI calculator that computes monthly payments, total amount, and interest based on user inputs.
A unit conversion tool supporting length, weight, and temperature conversions with dynamic unit selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and identity lifecycle management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables, dark mode styles, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Utility function to copy text to the clipboard using modern API with a fallback for older browsers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page assembling major site sections and injecting SEO structured data.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Static privacy policy page describing data practices with styled sections and icons.
frontend/src/pages/tools/AgeCalculatorPa: Lazy-loads the Age Calculator tool and renders it within a generic tool page layout with SEO content.
frontend/src/pages/tools/AttendanceCalcu: Page wrapper that loads the AttendanceCalculator component and passes SEO metadata into ToolPageLayout.
frontend/src/pages/tools/BmiCalculatorPa: Loads the BMI calculator tool and renders it within ToolPageLayout with BMI-specific SEO content.
frontend/src/pages/tools/CareerRoadmapGe: Hosts the AI career roadmap generator with a form and timeline, managing roadmap state and SEO content.
frontend/src/pages/tools/CgpaCalculatorP: Page for the CGPA/SGPA calculator, lazily loading the component and supplying CGPA-specific SEO config.
frontend/src/pages/tools/EmiCalculatorPa: Displays the EMI calculator tool within ToolPageLayout using its SEO text and lazy-loaded component.
frontend/src/pages/tools/InternshipEmail: Renders the internship email template generator tool with corresponding SEO content.
frontend/src/pages/tools/InterviewPrepCh: Loads and displays the interview preparation checklist tool inside the shared layout.
frontend/src/pages/tools/LinkedinProfile: Displays the LinkedIn profile checklist tool using ToolPageLayout and its SEO info.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ResumeBulletGen: Shows the resume bullet generator tool with related SEO content in the shared layout.
frontend/src/pages/tools/SgpaCalculatorP: Page for the SGPA calculator using the shared CGPA/SGPA calculator component and SGPA SEO metadata.
Reusable layout that renders tool pages with headings, tool components, SEO content, FAQs, and structured data.
frontend/src/pages/tools/UnitConverterPa: Loads and displays the unit converter tool with its SEO configuration.
frontend/src/routes/Router.tsx: Defines the app's routing structure, lazy-loads tool pages, and sets up the root layout with theme, navigation, and suspense.
frontend/src/seo/content/age.ts: Provides age calculator SEO content sections and FAQs including descriptions, use cases, and manual calculation steps.
frontend/src/seo/content/attendance.ts: Provides SEO content explaining attendance percentage, calculation steps, university rules, and tips for maintaining required attendance with references to related tools.
frontend/src/seo/content/bmi.ts: Defines BMI educational content covering what BMI is, how to calculate it, its limitations, and includes FAQs for health-related guidance.
frontend/src/seo/content/careerRoadmap.t: Contains detailed SEO text describing career roadmaps, how the AI generator works, and popular career paths for engineering students.
frontend/src/seo/content/cgpa.ts: Includes CGPA explanations, calculation formulas, conversion methods, and step‑by‑step guidance for tracking academic performance.
frontend/src/seo/content/emi.ts: Provides EMI-related content covering EMI basics, calculation formulas, education‑loan specifics, repayment tips, and FAQs.
frontend/src/seo/content/internshipEmail: Defines SEO content sections explaining cold emailing for internships, how to write effective internship emails, and how to find companies and contacts.
frontend/src/seo/content/interviewPrep.t: Provides structured interview preparation content covering technical, behavioral, and interview-day best practices for students.
frontend/src/seo/content/linkedinCheckli: Contains LinkedIn optimization guidance for students, detailing profile sections, skills, endorsements, and recommendations.
frontend/src/seo/content/resumeBullets.t: Offers guidance on writing effective resume bullet points, including formulas, examples, section-specific tips, and common mistakes.
frontend/src/seo/content/sgpa.ts: Defines SGPA-related content explaining what SGPA is, how to calculate it, step-by-step guides, and conversion to percentage.
frontend/src/seo/content/unitConverter.t: Defines SEO content sections and FAQ items for the Unit Converter tool, including explanations, common conversions, and student-focused guidance.
frontend/src/seo/HeadTags.tsx: Dynamically updates document title, meta tags, Open Graph, Twitter cards, and canonical URL based on the current route.
frontend/src/seo/jsonld.ts: Provides functions to generate JSON-LD schemas for web apps, breadcrumbs, and FAQ pages using site configuration data.
frontend/src/seo/seoRoutes.ts: Exports SEO metadata for each route, including titles, descriptions, keywords, and canonical paths for major site pages.
frontend/src/seo/siteConfig.ts: Stores global SEO config and returns the site base URL depending on environment, with defaults for production and development.
frontend/src/seo/StructuredData.tsx: Injects JSON-LD structured data scripts into the DOM for SEO.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s static-site architecture, goals, known issues, and existing features for the Student Hub build.
